data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Ayeyarwady to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ayeyarwady, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Ayeyarwady.
Father, let the threatened of Ayeyarwady, Myanmar (Burma) know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Ayeyarwady, Myanmar (Burma) a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kaman people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, guide the church in Ayeyarwady, Myanmar (Burma) to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 300,814 believers in Ayeyarwady to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 5,874,286 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Ayeyarwady.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

location.name: Ayeyarwady

location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Barua (500), Enn (500), Chak (1,900), Han Chinese, Cantonese (74,000), Karen, Yintale (11,000)
